title: How to Insert Buttons in an HTML Website

steps.title: Do a simple HTML coding
steps.content: Do a simple HTML coding . Once, you are through with the process, you can use it in your website. For now, keep your coding simple. Include tags like <title>, <head> and <body>

steps.title: Add <a href> tag under the <body> tag.
steps.content: Add tag under the tag. tag is used to insert hyperlinks. Under the tag and add your desired URL, say " https://www.wikihow.com/ ". The syntax of tag is: Your text / button here"

steps.title: Under <a> tag, add <button> tag.
steps.content: Under <a> tag, add <button> tag. This tag is used to add buttons in an HTML document. Add the desired text you want to display under the <button> tag. The syntax for the button tag is: "<button> Your Text Here </button>."

steps.title: Close the button tag and complete the coding by adding tags i.e.
steps.content: Close the button tag and complete the coding by adding tags i.e.

steps.title: Save the text file as an HTML document
steps.content: Save the text file as an HTML document . You can do so by going to Save as option on you text editor and adding the .html extension to the file name.
